tool_description: 車の最適な移動経路・料金を算出することができます。指定した順のほか、最適な並び順で検索結果を得ることができます。Calculate the optimal route and highway tolls. Returns search results with specified or optimal order.
name: NAVITIME Route(car)
title: NAVITIME Route(car)

api_list.name: route_car
api_list.description:
ルート検索(車）
自動車を移動手段として、２地点間のルートを探索します。経由地の指定も可能です。

optional_parameters.name: use_road
optional_parameters.description:
Road ID to use.
Can be specified multiple times, separated by a period.

optional_parameters.name: via_type
optional_parameters.description:
Routing mode.
(specified: specified order, optimal: optimal order, via_optimal: optimal order of travel between transit points)

optional_parameters.name: condition
optional_parameters.description:
Route search conditions.(recommend: recommended (default), 
toll_time: toll road use and time priority, 
toll_distance: toll road use and distance priority, 
toll_gas: toll road use and gasoline saving priority, 
free_time: free road use and time priority, 
free_distance: free road use and  distance priority, 
free_gas: free road use and gasoline saving priority,
free_only: free road use)

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description: Additional output information. (turn_by_turn: turn-by-turn information)  Point information for guiding progress information at intersections, etc.

optional_parameters.name: unuse_road
optional_parameters.description:
Road ID not to use.
Can be specified multiple times, separated by a period.

optional_parameters.name: via
optional_parameters.description: Destination. (maximum number of 10 points)

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: Output order. (total_distance: total movement distance, time: required time)

optional_parameters.name: ferry
optional_parameters.description: Ferry priority search. (unuse : do not use ferries, use : use ferries, more_use : use ferries first)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data. (degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: smart_ic
optional_parameters.description: Smart IC consideration. (unuse : not considering smart IC, use : considering smart IC)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description: Geodetic system of latitude and longitude. (wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: start_time
optional_parameters.description: Departure time. (ex.2019-09-26T08:00:00)

api_list.name: ic
api_list.description:
乗降IC検索
キーワードまたは緯度経度を指定してIC（インターチェンジ）情報を取得します。

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description:
Radius of search distances.
(Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 10,000, Default value: 2,000)
The unit is "meters".

Available only when 'coord' is specified.

optional_parameters.name: word
optional_parameters.description:
Search word.

You cannot be used in combination with 'coord'.
Please be sure to specify either 'word' or 'coord'.

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of response data. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 20, Default value: 10)

optional_parameters.name: coord
optional_parameters.description:
Latitude and longitude of the reference point for the search.
 (ex.35.689457,139.691935)
Available in milliseconds or degrees (decimal).

You cannot be used in combination with 'word'.
Please be sure to specify either 'word' or 'coord'.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
Interchange type (entrance：Interchange entrance, exit：Interchange exit).
If not specified, search for both entrance and exit.

api_list.name: fare_table
api_list.description: Return fare divisions including route search results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://navitime-route-car.p.rapidapi.com/fare_table"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "navitime-route-car.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://navitime-route-car.p.rapidapi.com/fare_table"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "navitime-route-car.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: shape_car
api_list.description:
ルート形状取得(車）
自動車を移動手段として２地点間のルートを探索し、その結果を形状で取得します。

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description: Geodetic system of latitude and longitude. (wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: start_time
optional_parameters.description: Departure time. (ex.2019-09-26T08:00:00)

optional_parameters.name: via
optional_parameters.description: Destination. (maximum number of 10 points)

optional_parameters.name: smart_ic
optional_parameters.description: Smart IC consideration. (unuse : not considering smart IC, use : considering smart IC)

optional_parameters.name: unuse_road
optional_parameters.description:
Road ID not to use.
Can be specified multiple times, separated by a period.

optional_parameters.name: condition
optional_parameters.description:
Route search conditions.(recommend: recommended (default), 
toll_time: toll road use and time priority, 
toll_distance: toll road use and distance priority, 
toll_gas: toll road use and gasoline saving priority, 
free_time: free road use and time priority, 
free_distance: free road use and  distance priority, 
free_gas: free road use and gasoline saving priority,
free_only: free road use)

optional_parameters.name: ferry
optional_parameters.description: Ferry priority search. (unuse : do not use ferries, use : use ferries, more_use : use ferries first)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data. (degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: use_road
optional_parameters.description:
Road ID to use.
Can be specified multiple times, separated by a period.

optional_parameters.name: no
optional_parameters.description: Route Number. In the case of one-to-many or many-to-one search, it is necessary to specify one route to output from among multiple routes in the result. If not specified, the first route will be selected.

optional_parameters.name: via_type
optional_parameters.description:
Routing mode.
(specified: specified order, optimal: optimal order, via_optimal: optimal order of travel between transit points)

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Output format (geojson: GeoJSON format (default), json: JSON format)

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description: Additional output information. (turn_by_turn: turn-by-turn information)  Point information for guiding progress information at intersections, etc.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: Output order. (total_distance: total movement distance, time: required time)
